name: Tomato Pasta
description: A quick and easy tomato pasta recipe.
instructions: Cook the pasta. Meanwhile, sauté garlic, add tomatoes, and simmer. Mix pasta with the sauce and garnish with basil.

name: Grilled Veggie Sandwich
description: A sandwich filled with grilled veggies and hummus.
instructions: Grill zucchini and bell pepper. Spread hummus on bread slices, layer with grilled veggies, and assemble the sandwich.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: A creamy risotto made with mushrooms and vegetable stock.
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms. Add rice, gradually pour in vegetable stock, and stir until creamy.

name: Vegetable Stir-fry
description: A quick stir-fry with mixed vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok, add vegetables, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, and season with soy sauce.

name: Lentil Soup
description: A hearty soup made with lentils, carrots, and celery.
instructions: Sauté onions, carrots, and celery. Add lentils and water, simmer until lentils are tender.

name: Greek-Inspired Salad
description: A refreshing salad with cucumber, tomato, and vegan feta.
instructions: Chop cucumber and tomato. Mix with vegan feta and olives. Drizzle with olive oil.

name: Chickpea Curry
description: A mild curry with chickpeas, coconut milk, and spices.
instructions: Sauté onions, add spices, stir in chickpeas and coconut milk. Simmer for 10 minutes.

name: Vegan Caprese Salad
description: An Italian-inspired salad with tomato, basil, and cashew cheese.
instructions: Slice tomatoes and layer with basil leaves and cashew cheese. Drizzle with olive oil.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with quinoa, beans, and tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook quinoa. Mix with beans and tomato sauce. Fill bell peppers and bake for 20 minutes.

name: Spinach and Tofu Scramble
description: A protein-rich scramble made with tofu and spinach.
instructions: Crumble tofu, cook with spinach, and season with nutritional yeast and turmeric.
